name: Time Criminal Investigation Department: Case 0
description:
"Someone is escaping the era."

"Can't we do something about it right now?"

"I'm going to volunteer both of us."

"Wait--"

__________________________________________________________

A 10-minute visual novel prototype about a new recruit who travels to the past to catch a time-hopping criminal. 

How to play:

Spacebar/Enter/Left mouse click to interact

Right mouse click to go to quick menu

__________________________________________________________

A submission for NaNoRenO 2022

__________________________________________________________
